meanings.sent1: The fruitfullest effort led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent2: Her fruitfullest ideas always improved the project.
meanings.sent3: The fruitfullest attempt to teach a fish to climb a tree was amusing.
meanings.sent4: His fruitfullest advice was like a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The fruitfullest strategies were the key to their victory.

meanings.sent1: Their fruitfullest fields yielded a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent2: The fruitfullest tree in the orchard bore the most fruit.
meanings.sent3: The fruitfullest garden gnome was the envy of all.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fruitfullest garden of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The fruitfullest soil produced the most vibrant flowers.

meanings.definition: Yielding or producing fruit in abundance
meanings.sent1: The fruitfullest apple tree in the orchard was always full of fruit.
meanings.sent2: In the fruitfullest season, the vines were heavy with grapes.
meanings.sent3: The fruitfullest banana peel slip was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the fruitfullest tree in a barren land.
meanings.sent5: The fruitfullest lemon tree perfumed the entire garden.
